name: 2D Shooter - Final (Space Gladiator!)
description:
Modifications: 

1) Created complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels.

2) Added levels to create a logical progression within the game. The first level starts with 7 enemies that are still. 2nd level is a combination of 15 still and chaser enemies. 3rd level is difficult with 24 chaser enemies to defeat.

3) Added space background to the main menu screen and changed the name of the game to "Space Gladiator!" 

Created by:

Ammar Syed
